buffs.description: Increases the production speed of Orc guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
buffs.name: Senior Instructor (Orc)

buffs.description: Increases stats of all soldiers (Attack / Defense / HP) by 7 levels for ever 5-star unit, 15 for every 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but cannot exceed 150 levels. Pact of the Grand Chief only applies to Stage Combat (main game mode)
buffs.name: Pact of the Grand Chief

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it Increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily Grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases movement speed of self by 10% and attack range by 9%.
Increases the movement speed and attack range of all units by 6% and attack by 8%.
Attack and critical chance towards enemy Crystal greatly increases.
Senior Instructor(Orc) Limit Break : The production speed of Orc Guild Units affected by the Senior Instructor(Orc) increase up to 200%.
Pact of the Grand Chief Limit Break : The max value of the effects of Pact of the Grand Chief increases from 150 to 250.
description.skill1: Increase attack speed of orc unit in Guild Raid (1%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Naga Knight ]
